gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.Components.Transparency
Class AnnotationOverlay

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.Components.Transparency.OverlayJPanel
                      gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.Components.Transparency.AnnotationOverlay
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPreserveState, IOverlay, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class AnnotationOverlay
extends OverlayJPanel

This class allows a user to write comments near a region on the IZoomTextAddible component. Since this class extends an OverlayJPanel, which extends a JPanel, this class is already serializable.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Field Detail

NOTES

public static final java.lang.String NOTES
"Notes" - This constant String is a key for referencing the state information about the annotations currently stored by this overlay. The value that this key references is a Vector of Note instances. Note is a private internal class within the AnnotationOverlay.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

LINE_COLOR

public static final java.lang.String LINE_COLOR
"Line Color" - This constant String is a key for referencing the state information about the color of the line connecting the annotation to the region of interest. The value that this key references is a Color.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

TEXT_COLOR

public static final java.lang.String TEXT_COLOR
"Text Color" - This constant String is a key for referencing the state information about the color of the annotation text. The value that this key references is a Color.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

FONT

public static final java.lang.String FONT
"Font" - This constant String is a key for referencing the state information about the font of the annotation text. The value that this key references is of type Font.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

DEFAULT_FONT

public static final java.lang.String DEFAULT_FONT
"Default Font" - This constant String is a key for referencing the state information about the initial font of the annotation text. The value that this key references is of type Font.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

OPACITY

public static final java.lang.String OPACITY
"Opacity" - This constant String is a key for referencing the state information about the invisibility of the selection outline. The value that this key references is a primative float on the range [0,1], with 0 = transparent, 1 = opaque.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

EDITOR_BOUNDS

public static final java.lang.String EDITOR_BOUNDS
"Editor Bounds" - This constant String is a key for referencing the state information about the size and bounds of the Annotation Editor window. The value that this key references is a Rectangle. The Rectangle contains the dimensions for the editor.

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Constructor Detail

AnnotationOverlay

public AnnotationOverlay(IZoomTextAddible izta)
Constructor creates OverlayJPanel with a transparent AnnotationJPanel that shadows the region specified by the getRegionInfo() of the IZoomTextAddible interface.

Parameters:
izta - - component must implement IZoomTextAddible interface

AnnotationOverlay

public AnnotationOverlay(IZoomTextAddible izta,
                         ObjectState state)
Constructor creates OverlayJPanel with a transparent AnnotationJPanel that shadows the region specified by the getRegionInfo() of the IZoomTextAddible interface.

Parameters:
izta - - component must implement IZoomTextAddible interface
state - - ObjectState this overlay is being set to.

getObjectState

public ObjectState getObjectState(boolean isDefault)
This method will get the current values of the state variables for this object. These variables will be wrapped in an ObjectState.

Specified by:
getObjectState in interface IPreserveState
Specified by:
getObjectState in class OverlayJPanel
Parameters:
isDefault - Should selective state be returned, that used to store user preferences common from project to project?
Returns:
if true, the default state containing user preferences, if false, the entire state, suitable for project specific saves.

addAnnotation

public void addAnnotation(java.lang.String a_note,
                          Line placement)
Allows toplevel components to add annotations. To use this method, be sure the path to the Line class is in your import statements. Path: DataSetTools/components/View/Cursor/Line.java

Parameters:
a_note -
placement -

removeAnnotation

public void removeAnnotation(int index)
Remove the annotation at the specified index.

Parameters:
index - The index of the annotation.

clearAnnotations

public void clearAnnotations()
Allows toplevel components to remove all annotations.

setOpacity

public void setOpacity(float value)
This method sets the opaqueness of the annotations. Values will fall in the interval [0,1], with 1 being opaque, and 0 being transparent.

Parameters:
value - - on interval [0,1]

kill

public void kill()
This method is called by to inform the overlay that it is no longer needed. In turn, the overlay closes all windows created by it before closing.

Specified by:
kill in class OverlayJPanel

paint

Overrides paint method. This method will paint the annotations.
